```{=html}
<style>
.slideshow {
  position: relative;
  width: 600px;      /* smaller width */
  height: 450px;     /* smaller height */
  margin: auto;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* all images stacked */
.slideshow img {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: contain;
  background: white;
  padding: 6px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadecert 12s infinite;  /* 4 images Ã— 3s = 12s */
}

/* timing (3 seconds each, with overlap so no blank) */
.slideshow img:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0s; }
.slideshow img:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1.5s; }
.slideshow img:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 4.5s; }
.slideshow img:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 7.5s; }

@keyframes fadecert {
  0%   { opacity: 0; }
  5%   { opacity: 1; }   /* fade in */
  30%  { opacity: 1; }   /* stay fully visible */
  35%  { opacity: 0; }   /* fade out */
  100% { opacity: 0; }
}
</style>
```
